name: Going Home (GULDOR, Learning to Code)
description:
There is still an update coming fixing the graphical oddity and fine-tuned gameplay.
tips are welcome!

A short and sweet puzzle/ maze game in a more childish look.

Find the exit before time runs out!
Every time you finish a stage, a level will be added to your tower according to the size of your completed maze. Do you fail to get the maze in one go the maze will shrink and so will the next level of your tower.

The tower will keep on growing higher and higher, but to many small levels and it will start to fall over.

Get the best hi-score and see what builds the biggest and highest tower before time runs out!

using: Depth-first search Algorithm

———

Controls: with the arrow keys
